oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Confederate veteran R.D. Smith
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a post Civil War photograph of R.D. Smith, a Confederate veteran from Lincoln County, Tennessee, with a barefoot young boy mounted on a white mule. Written on the back is "Your Great Grandpa Smith & Uncle Roy Green. Uncle Roy is about six years old."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Smith, R.D. ;Green, Roy
